lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to this evening's Critical Role, an online game of D&D where a bunch of us voice actors get together to be super nerdy and roll dice. And Sam just got here! And so we're going to send someone to go get Sam. Is someone getting Sam? All right! Great, Sam will be here shortly. Anyway, welcome! So, first and foremost, let's go ahead and get to our announcements so we can get to the game, because tonight is Critmas, which means we're going to be opening a bunch of amazing presents, letters, and stuff that you guys send to us. That'll be coming up soon. So first and foremost, wanted to let you guys know, if you haven't seen on Twitter yet, that the majority of our little merry band of players here are going to be appearing at Wizard World Portland in February. February 19th through the 21st.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everybody except for some people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could skip my daughter's birthday.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She'll have another one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's at the point where she'll kind of remember.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sam!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But yeah, February 19th through the 21st, we'll be there doing panels and signings and all kinds of fun stuff. So if you're in the Portland area or want to come out to the Portland area, we'll be there then. Come say hello. Don't waste your twenties, Laura. You know this!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She doesn't know this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. She'll never learn. I do like that you and Ashley coordinated, though, from across the country.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, right!?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're twinkies!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're twinkies!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But yeah, so guys. Go ahead and tweet at Wizard World and let them know how excited you are that we're going to Portland, because even if you're not able to go to this convention, the more that they see the audience has a need for more Critical Role at their conventions, they might bring us to other parts of the country. This is our trial run with their venues. So tell them how excited you are, and that'd be awesome. Cool. Next up, another convention coming up. Me and Marisha actually will be guests, weekend before that, at the Colorado Animefest in Denver, Colorado.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did I do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a dick. I'm always a dick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are a dick. It's good. It's a good place to be. But that's February 12th through the 14th in Denver.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. Valentine's Day weekend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. We're going to Casa Bonita. We're doing this South Park-style.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so excited.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you never been to Casa Bonita?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! I'm so excited.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would say you're in for a treat, but it's so much more than that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh man. Cliff divers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to be great. So, Colorado Animefest, February 12th through the 14th. Come say hello, we'd love to see you. Let's see. Liam, did you want to take the shout-out to The Witness?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah! There is a very interesting game coming out called The Witness at the end of this month. If any of you played Braid, which was an amazing platformer, but so much more than a platformer, it fucked with your head. That game was made by Jonathan Blow. Jonathan Blow is making another game called The Witness. I'm not going to tell you anything about it, but I'm voice directing, or I voice directed on it. This one, Ashley is in the game, and it was one of the most unique recording gigs I've ever had. I don't really know what I should say, but I think you guys are going to want to check it out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Said enough!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Boom. Done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wyrmwood Gaming, everyone!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wyrmwood!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wyrmwood Gaming, if you use the code "critrole," you'll get free shipping! Free shipping.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So stylish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mine says 'storyteller'.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wyrmwood Gaming?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Completely obsessed with it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not mine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not mine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's mine!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's Travis's!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ready?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pretend like you're a Dallas Cowboy and drop it. Is this yours? Is this yours?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First episode ever, Grog goes after Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was bound to happen. Also, I wanted to let you guys know, it's awesome, we got to donate five thousand dollars to 826LA at the end of last year because of you guys being so amazing. So once again, wanted to say thank you guys for that. That was fantastic and you're awesome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we're still supporting 826LA, so you can still donate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's still there, you can still do it.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: It's still there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They still be helping kids read and write and play D&D. It's amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They've also opened up Forgotten Realms to people who want to create stuff within the Forgotten Realms.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should totally put some stuff up there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I should.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You really should.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So good on you. So, any other announcements you'd like to make tonight? Anyone? Or are we about to start this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's get it on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So, to get you guys up to speed with what's happened recently: the party, upon returning from their adventure in Whitestone, had a meeting with the council of Tal'Dorei where they were able to provide information, a witness, and have the guidance of the now no-longer-charmed sovereign, Uriel Tal'Dorei, to alleviate them of any wrongdoing in the Briarwoods' arrival in Emon months ago, and reinstated their membership in the council, dropped the charges that were against them from the city of Emon and the party basically have now become once again lauded and accepted within the city. At the same time, Uriel, going through a bit of an emotional breakdown with his lack of seeming leadership in this whole circumstance. It was discovered that the reason his defences were improper was because there was an individual on the actual council who was a traitor, who'd been working with the Briarwoods and secretly a follower of Vecna from what the documents seemed to say. However, he had fled and the party decided to go ahead and probably do a little better job than the local guard would, find out if he was too far or not. They found that he was still in the city, beneath the city, and happened to correlate his current location with the Clasp, the thieves' guild of the city's current underground base which the party had previously had a few run-ins before. So making their way to the inn that houses one of the secret entrances to the Clasp's hideout, they encountered a band of traveling musicians. Doctor Dranzel's wondrous performance group made their way-- the magical? I'm trying to remember what the actual full term was on that one that you wrote for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, their troupe? The troupe name? Oh man, I wrote that three years ago. I have no idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. I wrote it down in a document that I didn't print out. But I will for future shows. So Dr. Dranzel--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll look it up on the break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there you go. It had a great performance troupe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Magical Mystery Band.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's the one. And discovered a number of past individuals of Scanlan's performance history as well as a few new friends and got into an epic flute duel of which he threw and in doing so, being a man of his word, gave the remaining gold coins in his pouch to a young gnome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just the worst.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was worth it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we'll find out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like a Tom Waits song.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, with the distraction being successful the rest of the party snuck through the kitchen into the hatch and they had an encounter with the Clasp after calling out to them within their own hideout. Telling them that they were after this fugitive and not planning to do any terrible business in the guild and managed to convince them to let them go about their way and Vox Machina had a showdown with the traitor, Riskel Daxio, within his cell, before he was supposed to be ushered out of the city, given a new name, and essentially be given free rein in the world. The party then beat him down pretty hard and are currently dragging his bleeding, unconscious corpse towards the Cloudtop District to turn him in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right. That's right. He's not dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's an unconscious corpse. Which means it's technically--

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Not a corpse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is true. I don't know why I said corpse.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Foreshadowing!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no. What are we going to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A near corpse. He is borderline corpse.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mostly dead. Not all dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you've interacted with these individuals a few times as your experiences here in the city so far and they've grown to recognize you just by appearance and you guys tend to stroll up as a posse of confidence, which draws their attention.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking with my clique.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're Reservoir Dogging it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 'Sup.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Walking really slow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point the sun is setting, it's probably getting close to dusk. You guys stroll up and the two guards approach immediately. "Can I ask you what you're doing here? You've got "someone--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have a present for Uriel. Open the gates.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, what's the present?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you questioning part of the council at this moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, if there is business to be done I have to go ahead and put it up the chain of command to "make sure that I'm doing my job so I don't end up being lashed for my--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course, darling, and you're doing a wonderful job of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I appreciate that and I'd appreciate you helping me do my job, if that's all right."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have a present for Uriel. Open the gates. Send it up the chain of command.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns around and walks back, the other guy looks back awkwardly and follows him. He gives a couple hand motions and the gates open up to the inside of the Cloudtop District.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's on the back of the bear, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The bear we left at home.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The bear we left in the alley.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He is with us. What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Next time. Next time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We take him inside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait a minute!

lines.name: TRAVIS, SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's Trinket right now?! Why isn't he on the set?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where is Trinket?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's in the alley.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm getting him right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, no, no. Come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know where he is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look Sam, what did you do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is just like when David Copperfield made the Statue of Liberty disappear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just like it. Exactly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep. David Copperfield? Feld?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's amazing because you can like hear her footsteps. It's like a cartoon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like an ad for Atmos Surround, you hear (ticking noises).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's totally like a Pixar intro.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm excited for the prospect of watching this happen right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing can go wrong. This is a great idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No one help her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No one help her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She can do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got this, Laura. You got this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You got it. You got it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Help me. Can you see this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Travis, move your butt! I've got to get Trinket through!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Travis can move, he's not going to help you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please, Travis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, I'll move. I'll move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a wonderful microcosm analogy for pretty much every session.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he's here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yay! Well done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Totally worth it. Is he good? Is he placed well, you guys?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a good core body workout.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, I'm so strong.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This was the best opening of our show.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your strength?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very low.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, pushing towards the central palace, the guards approach once again. These ones a little more stern than the ones you met on the outside of the district. "What's your business at the palace?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We, look, we have a body over this bear! Let us through to Uriel; he's been looking for this man. Super important.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards look over at the bear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They know this man. They should know this man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You found Riskel Daxio?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course we did!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, men!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a present.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other guards begin to step forward like, "We'll take it from here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No no no. No, you won't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The fuck you will.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We would like to deliver this personally as we don't know if he has any co-conspirators, so it would be best if he didn't leave our immediate vicinity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we really want to see his face when he opens it. That's the best part of giving a gift.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you need?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vex, this is all yours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well, not all me. This is all of us. We found your traitor for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Really?" And he stands up and the rest of the guards that came up behind you keep an eye to make sure nothing weird goes wrong, they step forward a few steps and, "Bring him forth. Hold "him. In irons. Chains. Now." And all the guards go and pull him off of Trinket, throw him on the ground face-first. He slaps into the marble flooring of the chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Little bit of blood smeared across the ground as his face glides--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he's beat up pretty bad, you might not want to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uriel looks down and, "Wake him up."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Someone. I don't care. Wake him up."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got it! I walk over and I slap the shit out of him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You may kill him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, he's dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a resounding slap sound, Riskel sends a spatter of spittle and blood that coasts across the floor and his head shakes. As he looks up at you, you can see his teeth that were once white now glisten with fresh blood across the entirety of his smile.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hello, gorgeous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do what you will." He looks up and sees Uriel. "My liege, what would you have of me?" Uriel takes a moment, intensely staring at his face. "For so many years you played me and my "family. You played the people of this city, of these lands. You've forsaken the name of your father "who plucked you from nothing. How? How can you live with this?" Riskel takes a moment, chuckles to himself, this throaty gurgle as he's still trying to breathe through the blood pooling in the back of his throat. "Life is but a stage of our existence. And when you all will die, I will rise "again. For I am his blood."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are his blood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uriel steps back up on his throne and sits down. "Riskel Daxio, you have been found guilty of "treason by the peoples of Tal'Dorei. I command that your sentence of death be held immediately."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sovereign, if I may, can we ask him a few questions before you do what you gonna do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Quickly."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's talking crazy, we should find out why, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's talking crazy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He said, "I am born of his blood." What blood?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you one of Vecna's children? Are you one of his priests? Are you one of his--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're the chatty Cathy. Get with the talking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what I'm asking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You never do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you ask him that, "There are many parts to our one to him. I'm but his blood, but there "are many, many, different pieces that make the whole."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are these pieces located?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everywhere. Good answer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So when you say you are his blood you actually mean more literally for once? Is that what I'm getting?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His eyes narrow and he looks for a moment almost disappointed in confusion. "Just kill me "now. I grow impatient with this existence."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not a problem. Is there somewhere where you would like to go after you die? Or are you going to wake up right after you die?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I guess we'll find out."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, and are you going to wake up like a baby so we have like 20 years before we have to worry about you again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or are you like a zombie, straight, straight away up and at 'em?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He might come back as like a dog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please, please, kill me now. End this paltry existence."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if you come back as like a fish and then you're screwed and stuck in the water?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, or like a penguin, so he's like a bird that can't fly and he can only swim.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he's stuck waddling around. That'd be so sad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Uriel. As thanks for bringing you this gift, we need to run Grog out once in a while. Might he have the honor of removing this shitstain from the world?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Unless, of course, you'd like to do it yourself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uriel contemplates for a moment. "He's at your disposal. I only ask that you do it soon and "in my sight."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you sure there's no more useful information we can get from this man?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, Riskel, Grog can do it kind of quickish or take a very long time. I've seen him do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I start stretching.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Digit by digit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can be sent on your way to whatever asshole you think you're going to, but he can make it very uncomfortable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He could strip you of all your limbs and leave you hanging. Not dead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I once saw him kill a man with his taint.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With his own taint.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an intimidation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The taint intimidation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So juicy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like balsamic vinaigrette.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've wanted to make this pun my entire life.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Intimidation, you said. Oh, hell, I'm using Luck in case I can do better. No, 17.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He taint intimidated. Got to get it out of my system. I'm so sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see his eyes begin to roll back in his head. "Do what you must." Begins to fade back into unconsciousness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's the marble? What's the little ball? What's it do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know what you're talking about."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not very important. Blood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The deal with my master is power through not knowing. He is the one who knows all. The fact "that he keeps it from us means that he trusts us."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the stupidest thing I've ever heard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, Grog, take off his little marble please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait, wait. We're not going to get any information out of him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, maybe we should have Pike cleanse his blood so he won't come back after he dies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a good idea! Pike, why don't you bless him? Why don't you make him holy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His eyes dart around for a moment with a look of sudden curiosity and worry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I think that would be fun!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's not possible."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, it is. Sarenrae could always use new servants. Right, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, of course!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've seen her regrow a foot. It's amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Deception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, okay. Ooh, which one? All right. All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The good one!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, that's not the good one. 11. Do I get advantage because Pike is helping?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because she is helping with it and she is the source of it, I'd say sure. Go ahead and roll with advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Haha! That's much better. 23!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. Okay. You can see now at this point, his breathing is quickened and he's swallowing more regularly. There's a look of sincere nervousness in his eyes. "His power is great. There is nothing "this paltry little child of a being can do to keep his will from his promise."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you shithead.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, maybe we'll just give it a try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it! Do it!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just stay still. It's better on the light side, so hold on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It worked for me. It was really quite an experience.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Master have mercy."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're looking in the wrong direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, do you know-- Unless you have something to share with us. Do you know of his awakening?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could just let you go to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have any details? Something that could lead us to him? Your god of secrets?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, he's too strong. Fill him with holy light, Pike. Do it now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're right. And then he'll help us for sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, because maybe he'll remember and tell us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Wait. Am I doing Greater Restoration?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to. It's whatever you want to try.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's try it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You rushed in. It was not time. "

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did it need? What would have made it time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where the magic ley lines across this world cross and swell. You forced our hand. I was not there. I "do not know the answer and I hope it was enough."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It probably wasn't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there plans to attempt this at the next Winter's Crest that you know of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point you can see now this look of despair hits his eyes, and then resolve. He goes from this fearful moment to the realization that he has already expressed more than he should. But hopefully it's not too much to fall out of the favor of his lord. And a smile creeps across his face for the first time since this whole thing and he grins. "It is time." And he leans forward and puts his neck out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vecna's going to be so pissed at you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have we tried to Restoration him first?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah. She didn't do it yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She didn't do it yet, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you want to cast the spell on him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then we'll kill him!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should I do it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why not? We'll see what happens.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I crouch down, take two fingers and I get him by the nostrils and pull back the top of his head and say, "Do it, Pike. Pour in your holy light right in his mouth. Give it all to him."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, as you reach forward, you take the Sarenrae symbol and you jam it into his open mouth. As it does-- yeah, just like that. A burst of divine light comes spewing out the sides, and you see him choking on some unseen force.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A holy dick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably a combination of him swallowing his own tongue, but as you pull the symbol back, completing the spell of restoration, you can see the energy pour through his body and he's shaking out of fear. His eyes begin to roll back, and from the sound of it he's actually swallowing his own tongue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Did it kill him? Did Greater Restoration just kill him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's choking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold on. Hold on. And I stick my fingers into his mouth and I grab his tongue and pull it down to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh gosh, this is so terrible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This guy's an asshole!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. I know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's really uncomfortable.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He earned this grief.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear Uriel's voice behind you say, "Enough. Get it over with." (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry. Sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Good try, Pike. That was really good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was really awesome, Pike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nobody else has any other questions?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just keep it clean so we can burn everything afterwards.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, what happened to him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take out Craven Edge, and I step back, and with a huge swing aim right under his trin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trin. As the blade is drawn from Grog's back, you can see it draws this trail of shadow behind it almost through the slow arc as he rears it back for the swing. As the blade with a flash, impossibly fast, arcs its way across Riskel's throat, you can see his eyes open up with a sudden realization as the moment of pain and death hits him. Then a smile draws across his lips as the head slowly rolls back. The blood then gouts out with the last pumps of his heart. His body slumps forward, the guards holding him as they can, spilling a pool out in the center of the floor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh jeez, Uriel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As this happens, Grog, you feel this wave of exhilaration. This almost ecstatic pulse of joy comes across your body. This sense of taking his life with this blade, the first time you've really actually used it, was delightful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got goose pimples. Was that good for you guys or what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know if you should be smiling this much. You just killed a man. Have a little respect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but he was evil. Not happy time?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quiet happy time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uriel stands up. "Guards, have this mess cleaned. Burn the body. Thank you very much."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really quickly, have we looted the body already?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like I did, didn't I? When he was in--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did, you already looted the body.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We did. We already got the skull with the missing eye.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I turn to the side and go, how was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the voice creep up and say, "Now we see eye to eye."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't see you anywhere? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The aura of the shadow from the blade retracts, and the blade becomes an onyx blade. It appears to have rescinded his presence.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's shy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Craven Edge and Grog!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh man, I so badly want to fix that sword to save Grog, but at the same time, I don't! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sovereign?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, I know we just talked earlier today and everything, but it feels like we should get some sort of reward or something for capturing this guy, doesn't it? I mean is that impolite to ask?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We did do it pretty expediently.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was the same day, wasn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was." And he sits there for a second and nods his head. "Very well. We were prepared to put "out a bounty for his arrest, and I feel it would only be fair to provide you with this bounty." He snaps his fingers. A guard comes up and he whispers to him for a second. As he walks away, "You will have a sum of 5,000 gold pieces delivered to Greyskull Keep this evening."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate it. Now please, be on your way. I have business to attend to. Thank you very much."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good evening, your lordship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gets up and walks away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Feel like it could have been more, honestly. Whatever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really? It's a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I add that now, or should I wait until it actually gets delivered?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably when it gets delivered. It could be intercepted and stolen on the way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A lot could happen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why would you even say that? Why would you even put that out there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What should we do? Should we go home, then?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I suppose so. It's been a long day. We've taken damage today. We should go home.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. We should go heal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wasn't there something we were going to do, though?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By now, the sun's probably set, and so as you step out of the palace, you look up at the skyline. Little plumes of clouds throughout, but you can see the distinct bright oranges and purples of sunset have taken, and to the far east, you can see the dark blue of creeping night.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long has the sun been down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It just set. It's heading toward dusk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who wants to get a drink?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were just in a tavern all day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but that was work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We weren't really drinking. We were pretend drinking. We could be real drinking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Were we supposed to be pretend-- yeah, sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now the door incident really makes sense, if some of us were really drinking in that tavern.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That, or we just hate doors. Let's go get a drink!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm all right with that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Same tavern?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go to old faithful. Where's old faithful?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Old faithful, technically, would be the Laughing Lamia, which is where you guys originally stayed when you first came to Emon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's do faithful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or do we want to branch out?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Find a new place?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Taste some new ale!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's start a pub crawl.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Pub crawl!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it a lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are a smart one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's the closest pub here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's leading the pub crawl?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel so much better for every terrible thing I've said. Oh my god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're going to lose experience points for this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like my intelligence went down one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But I'm going to start looking into designing that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The entire party's intelligence goes to one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You get a 1d10 bonus against a roll versus him. It's to knock him down a peg.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So who's heading the pub crawl?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Am I heading the pub crawl?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't know this town. Who knows this town the best?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: None of us know this town.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, it's technically our town. We should get to know our city, you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I'm walking in a direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I'm going to use a different die because it's funnier that way. That's an eight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can't really do this wrong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over the next couple hours, you meander a while through Abdar's Promenade, there are a couple dives, but the clientele doesn't seem very jovial.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is the worst pub crawl ever! This took two hours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You find about four different establishments, but most of them appear to be less of the "party hardy" crowd and more of the "my life sucks, I need alcohol" crowd.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm still recovering my spirit here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you need me to yelp it again? All right, I will roll an investigation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It couldn't hurt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Let me talk to some people and see if I can find some things. Investigation? 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. Chatting around--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's a good place to go? I'm looking for a speakeasy. Something off the beaten path.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something off the beaten path. Word of mouth type place. Okay. Let's see.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! I like that he's checking out his Yellow Pages.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt's thinking about all the battle maps he drew over the last week, and we're doing a pub crawl.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like, "Fine. We're doing a pub crawl."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey, man. Nothing wrong with that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or just a place that comes highly recommended.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or poorly recommended.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you eventually hear about a place called Howarth's. Howarth's.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like H-O-A--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Howarth's.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have we been to Howarth's?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He just made it up. We've not been there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like Woolworth's, but Halworth's?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Like "Hogwarts" without the G?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I guess you'd say. Howarth's. When you get there, it appears to be more of a textile business, but from what you've heard, it's more a business that runs the front, and then the real company is in the back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Textiles and beer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just around the corner. Back room." Points you over. As you guys walk in, there's a pretty happening establishment in here. There's a harp player on the far edge of the room on the stage, who's playing a very beautiful piece. Even though she's just playing the harp, it's almost emanating the sound of multiple instruments. There's probably about ten or so people in here. It's not extremely crowded, but everyone in there appears to be rather upper crust folks that either have descended from the Cloudtop District to rub shoulders with the less elite of the town and a few wealthy merchants. It's a pretty decent place for rabble rousers who have some coin to spend.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's get a round, shall we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Oh, I would say you could buy, Scanlan, but you have no money.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You gave me a thousand gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did, so you have enough to buy for everyone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm feeling generous. I'll buy us a round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You chat amongst yourselves and you meet a few individuals in the establishment and make a few friends. Overall, it's a pretty decent way to finish a rather long day of more work than you had originally anticipated. As the buzz begins to wear off and the evening draws to a close, you guys find yourselves getting a little hungry and this place is pretty much solely a bar experience, as opposed to a straight pub, and it's probably pushing close to 11.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go home?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! Guys. The evening is our-- what do they say about things like that? The evening is our oyster. Right? Isn't that what they say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, close.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I said it's pretty close.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, thank you, Pike. Let's stay out all night. Come on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, old man!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We never take time for ourselves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. Keyleth's been day-drinking and night-drinking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's that girl.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm walking up to the barkeep and I say, Hi!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, that's so loud.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to keep drinking, but also eating, so where's the closest place to do that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "At this hour?" And the gentleman who's talking to you now, his chin appears to have been broken at some point in his life so as he talks the jaw swivels from side to side in an awkward, old Disney cartoon way. It's hard to really put into words. His hair is spotty in places, it's thinning in the front, but he's well-dressed. It's one of those things where the outfit does not match the persona. But he looks over to you and, "Well, sir, at this point in the evening, food "might be a little hard to procure, unfortunately."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As far as I know."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guys, there's got to be like some street vendors. Come on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to find the most interesting, boisterous clientele in the bar and I'm going to approach them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we getting in a fight?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for that. Yes! That's much better. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you're glancing about and you're talking to the bar, and the rest of you guys are finishing a round of drinks, you are looking around--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just remembered 5,000 gold is being delivered to the keep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry. We have servants.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have servants. It's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Drink more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, isn't this the luckiest day for me!"

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Gilmore!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at this motherfucker right here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Vax'ildan!" He runs up and grabs you and (kiss kiss).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I lift him. I lift him in the air and twirl him around and I put him down on a bar stool and I give him a playful slap on the cheek. Not that hard, but like. How are you? It's so good to see you! God, you look good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You as well, my friend, you as well."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Gilmore! Gilmore. What are you drinking? We're buying. What are you drinking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, obviously whatever she's having."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have any food? They don't have any.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They don't have any. They would not serve food here. No, it's a finer establishment."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where can we go for food, Gilmore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Um." And he thinks for a second. He reaches back into a small satchel he has at his side and he pulls out a little pouch. He opens the pouch, and he reaches out and he pulls out a small wooden domino, like in size. "If you wouldn't mind clearing some of these tables for me?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh sure, sure. Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not a problem. Stand up, you lot!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Unnecessarily knocking over the drinks off the table of one of the nearby individuals, but they don't argue with the goliath.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's clear. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gilmore!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: These things are not cheap.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Gilmore!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see in his other hand the gem-encrusted chalice from the middle of his pouch dissipates in the arcane energy. He says, "Well, I figured it was a special occasion."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Darling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, Gilmore, this is too much! Really. This is amazing. You're such a kind, generous soul.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Actually, I've gotten word that you've been spreading the wonders of my brand, though--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) That's true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everywhere we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So I appreciate that, I really do."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not only that, we've, I don't know if word has reached you yet, but in Whitestone we're working towards establishing a Gilmore-themed library for the people with your name attached to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Something respectable for a change!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I don't know about that. I've still got to finish building my shop in Westruun, but when "that is done, I'll be more than happy to look into it."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you need any help, count on us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whitestone. Whitestone. Hmm. Place has been kind of dour as of late."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Up-and-coming. I tell you that much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really turning around. Really turning around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can turn a coin and do right by the world. They are in need, and that place is going to explode, I'm telling you. Can I get another drink, please?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're even changing the name, they're making it more hip, it's going to be called WhiSto now. It's great. Just shortening it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Another for her as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's had one drink.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When do we tell her that's a Shirley Temple? (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, it's been fermenting for a while.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So hammered off this cherry juice, you guys. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But nevertheless, as it winds down a bit, you guys are all finding yourselves settling in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I sit down and talk to Gilmore for a moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Keyleth gets up and moves and sits next to Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I go and challenge Grog to a dart game.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gilmore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, my dear?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We ran into a really weird thing in Whitestone, and I bet you know some shit about it, because you know shit about everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Weird things in particular, is that what you're insinuating?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kind of, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, fair enough."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vecna?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The moment you say that, you see his jovial exterior harden for a second, and his eyes close and he goes, "That's a strange name to bring up this late in the evening."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bad news bears, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah. I kind of almost died. (laughs) Because of him, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Almost is better than actually, so congratulations."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you. But yeah. There's a spinning ball of death, really. An orb that sucks things into it. It's black. It's underground. We don't know what to do with it really and I'm kind of worried, I guess, about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Spinning black orb of death..."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They were trying to wake him up, but they said it was too early. They did it before Winter's Crest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He thinks for a second and says, "The only orb of spinning death I'm familiar with is a "Sphere of Annihilation, but those are generally a bit larger than what you're describing to me, at "the very least."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I feel like maybe they wanted it to get bigger? I don't know. Oh! Oh! There was a hand, and an eye, and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Those generally follow around the phrase 'Vecna'."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know too much other than what I've been told historically, and bits of information "that I've picked up through the years. Vecna..." And he thinks for a second, he starts looking about if anyone else is near the table, you guys are off and throwing darts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm listening in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pike, I don't know where you are, but I assume you're still--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm listening. I'm listening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He was slain, but as you've seen, when entities of such power get to a certain point, death is but a "hurdle. You have enough individuals that believe you're a god, that willpower is strong enough to "keep you enduring. So his influence exists and has for many years. I don't know if he's a god per se, "not yet, but there are those that treat him as such, and that in itself is dangerous because that "means he's probably still out there. And I'm pretty sure he's very interested in finishing what "he couldn't before."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was he-- Just trying to be a god, is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's all I've heard. Not a scholar of the religious rites, and for the most part a lot of "his history's been, well, destroyed and kept secret. It's his bailiwick."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's his thing. Well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But anyway. If you've indeed come across any of this foul business, I recommend you stay "far away. Far away! Bad news."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bad news.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. Anyway, sorry, dour subject. Didn't mean to bring the mood down on that one."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't worry. It helped. Helped us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it's been a fun night, guys, but I'm tired of letting Grog beat me at darts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You really suck. I don't know if it's because you're so tiny--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They put the dart board so high on the wall!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but you put darts in two people's arms, I mean, are you really that--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, one of those people was giving us the stink-eye.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true. He squealed out like a little girl, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we should go home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should go home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Noooo.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth, please, don't be this way. We'll go out again tomorrow. It'll be fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You say that now, and then tomorrow some crazy person will show up at our door and want us to do something crazy and then we'll never have a free night again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm super old. Let's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what's really cool to do at the end of the night actually that will make you be there for the sun coming up, is if you do four shots of firewater in a row.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. It's a thing. It reinvigorates you, but you got to do them back to back to back to back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do hear that cures the hangover.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to encourage. No. I'm going to encourage this now. I think this is a great idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Listen, listen. Only because I'm identifying with your need for revelry, why don't you and I go do four shots back to back to back to back?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's do it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys stand up and walk away, Gilmore looks to you and goes, "I like her much better "this way."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Gilmore, I love you too!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, you stay here. I'll bring it to the table. And I go and get the shots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of your drinks for the evening are paid for, Gilmore takes care of the tab.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, Gilmore!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Gilmore!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You come back with the shots--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh wait, I want one, then!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right! Pike gets a shot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine shots. Ten shots.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She said two shots. She wants two shots.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, two shots?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She wants two shots, and so wait, are me and you doing the two and the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's ten shots.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Quadruple?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, quad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is the stupidest thing ever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? She wants to see the sunrise. She'll totally be up for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let it happen. We're all going to learn a valuable lesson.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. It's amazing. I come back with ten shots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so who's drinking. One shot? Four shots.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And she's getting two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And two for Pike, so 11 shots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. I need constitution saving throws from all four of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we get a constitution bonus from the Heroes' Feast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not a constitution bonus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't want it, anyway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Don't want it anyway. Oh, that's not good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, wow!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight. Total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, what'd you get?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 20. I'm so sorry, 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, Percy, you take your shot. It burns down. You're fine. Pike, bam, bam. The little gnome takes it in her gut, grins, wipes the edge of her chin, looks over to Grog with a bit of a challenge look on her face. Grog, you look over to Keyleth and both of you guys start slamming down the line. As you hit that fourth one, you can feel the burn on the inside. You, a little bit of that Heroes' Feast begins to creep up, and you get that acidic, you know--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Salsa?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Have to stop a little bit, take it back down, but you're good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Little mild salsa?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you're good. You kick it back. As soon as you open your eyes, you're like-- You look over across the way and all you see is Keyleth, her expression go from a big smile, to neutral, to a worried frown, looking to the door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's going to-- She's going to take hit points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got to go outside. I got to go outside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got her. I got her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got to-- no, no, no, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, she's got to stay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vax! Vax! Hold her hair back! Hold her hair back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should pick her up and carry her around the bar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Help her out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need to stay here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Come on, Keyleth!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll go help her out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got her. We've got her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What are you doing, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait. Okay, I want to help Keyleth out because she's-- yeah. Go ahead, go ahead, go ahead. Hold on. Go ahead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you guys all--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike, tell me a story!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys drag Keyleth outside-- Scanlan? You're staying?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not going near that shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Vax is staying, and Pike? You're staying?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As this is happening, Gilmore sits up and begins to finish off his drink. "Ah, "it's good to see friends."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You too, Gil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You aren't going, are you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's getting very late. I've only been back a few days and I have a lot of business to attend "to in the morning."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sure you do. Could I borrow your ear for a few minutes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Certainly. It would be my absolute pleasure."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want some privacy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In private.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh. Far be me to stand in a way of a private conversation." And he stands up for a second and walks over to the far table in the corner, right by the stage where the harpist was playing but is no longer on the stage. He sits down expectantly, waiting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I watch this conversation from the doorway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, if you guys are-- the doorway leads into the textile portion, so if you guys aren't leaving the place entirely--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I figured we were just outside the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you want to hang by the textile, I've taken her all the way out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just going to hang out and watch in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Keyleth, make another constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This should be fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's better. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you do manage to make it all the way outside of the building before you Druidcraft all over-- (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, go! Oh, not on the jacket!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that looks terrible. That looks terrible! Don't do that. Don't do that! That looks really bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Giffed for eternity. It's the internet, you can't take it back. It's there forever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's there forever. All the Percyleth shippers now having a field day. All right, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. You'll be even sorrier in the morning. It's all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog said it would make me stay up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's okay. It's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you sit down. "Yes, Vax'ildan, darling?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've known each other a long time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Long time, yeah? And I have a lot of love for you. You are an amazing man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well. Not disagreeing with you there."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is part of your charm. I don't even know what I'm saying. I feel I need to be honest with you. There's no question you and I have danced around each other a bit in the past few years, and I have been curious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well. Curiosity is the spark of arcane pursuits and knowledge. Among many other things."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've come close many times to going further than I have. You are a charming man. But I respect you very much. And I need to tell you that I can't do the dance anymore. I am in love with someone I don't think loves me, but all the same, it wouldn't be fair to you to think that we might dally, and I don't want to be a liar, so I won't be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I certainly appreciate your honesty, and, well, I would be lying if I didn't say I was "a little disappointed, but at the same time, the heart wants what the heart wants, and I've enjoyed "our flirtation. Perhaps our paths aren't meant to be quite so entwined. Such is the flow of fate, my friend." (sighs) And he gives a little sigh of digesting heartbreak a little bit, but, you know, there's a nod to him of understanding and acceptance, and he looks up to you again with that whipcrack of a Gilmore smile and says, "I wish you luck. The path of an uncertain heart is never an "easy one, and should you ever need an ear to bend or a shoulder to cry on, well, you know where I "am, and if I'm not there, you know how to get hold of me."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I reach out, hand behind his head, and I say, you are a beautiful arcane bastard, and I kiss him full on the lips.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vax getting all the kisses.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pat him on the shoulder. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes his cup, which is empty and holds it up to the last drop. It puddles out. (sighs) "Good night to you, Vax'ildan."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good night, Gil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Walks out into the night. As Gilmore walks by you guys, he looks over at Keyleth and goes, "Get her some water."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why does my mouth keep producing saliva?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll get her water. I'll get her a little jug of the firewater. It'll wash out her mouth.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I cast Lesser Restoration on her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, let's do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cure alcohol poisoning?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just to give her still a little bit of a buzz. To just take the bad part out of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A proper use of divine magic!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think that works.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can Pike follow us around all the time everywhere for the rest of our days?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike is the best wingman.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike, Pike, I missed you so much.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come here, come here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry, you guys. I'm so sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, as Pike embraces you, the warmth of her hug is also matched with the warmth of the divine energy that briefly flows through your body, and for a second you feel as if you're weightless, and the nausea is gone. The drunkenness is still there, and the buzz is still finding its way through your system, but not as heavy as it was before. You come a little more conscious of yourself, and when the warmth fades, you feel much more in control of your current state of your mind, your well-being, and the contents of your stomach.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit. What kind of shots did you give me, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The weak stuff. Yeah. I think they call it regret?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Peach schnapps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Goldschlager.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Goldschlager. Jaeger. Lemon citron vodka.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh man, I love this game.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we go home?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go home. We've left our mark here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does Keyleth lose the benefits of the Heroes' Feast since she retched it all over the ground?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why would you ask that question?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's such a dick question to ask.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My body absorbed the process and the calories.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It had been a few hours, or probably about an hour since the initial feasting, so she's had enough to maintain the effect. But the gentleman who owns the establishment is probably not going to be very happy in the morning when he has to clean up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I made it outside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kick some dirt over her puke.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just twigs and berries, anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way back to Greyskull Keep. As you approach the front gate of your establishment, you see Cordell and Shayne keeping their evening watch over the gate. Cordell shouts down to the rest of you guys, "You've got guests waiting for you!"

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long have they been here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks to Shayne. Shayne looks to him, counts in her head. "I think probably at least two hours."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (splutters) How many times have we told you? Don't let guests in when we're not here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They had your permission."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, jeez. Who is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, it's a bunch of them."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's my friends! This is why I wanted to come home!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Jesus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The party keeps going! Cordell! Cordell, open another bottle!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks over at Shayne, who goes, "Don't do that, Cordell."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: God damn it, Cordell, we pay you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's okay, ignore her. Let's go in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The gate opens. You guys come inside, and you find, as you enter the keep, the smell of a recently cooked meal is permeating the air of the keep. You hear laughter and a little bit of music in the distance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At least they're having fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you walk towards the eating chambers, the central feasting area on the bottom floor of your keep, there indeed you see your recently discovered friends.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that little-- is it a halfling teenager that was picking pockets at the bar? Is he here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I walk up to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Samson right now, by the way, is asleep on a table. It's way past his bedtime. He's on the edge there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I nudge him awake. Hey, Sticky Fingers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hello, miss."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey. So I saw you at the bar, getting things off of people pockets. Off of people pockets?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They told me they wouldn't miss them."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's totally fine. I don't care. You haven't done that here, have you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, not unless he tells me to." And points to Dr. Dranzel, who at this point has been like, "Scanlan! Finally." (chuckles)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lovely to see you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see now, there's three bottles of wine they've been drinking that are open and about.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you bring those?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No! But they were provided, and I'm not one to not drink when it's not provided."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You opened wine, and I yelled at you. I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cordell's at the front gate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I figured Cordell walked us in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they're up on the front gate. Keyleth is talking out to nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Cordell! Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Lesser Restoration didn't have quite as strong an effect on reversing the alcohol, but she's not puking, so that's good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still drunk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doctor, thank you for coming over and bringing the gang. It's so great to see you again tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eselmyr's in the back corner, watching everyone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that the singer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Unless it's too late in the night, I have a conversation I'd like to have."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, please. Lay it on us. Anyone want to go to bed?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) "I like her!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, but let's do this anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Laina, bring around some meats! Wait, we already ate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We already ate. We're fine. We're so full.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Laina, go back to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) She looks tired. She's like, (whimpering) "More meats? Okay. Is it all right if "I go to bed?"

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dranzel waves you all in. "So, that little proposition that we talked about at the bar "earlier today? The old man who didn't need his fortune?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Allow me to elaborate a bit in a more private setting, if you don't mind."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: More private than our house?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is the more private."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah. Cin-cin, everybody. Cin-cin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that lipstick on your face, Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe it is. I don't know where it would have come from, though. This is a land of magic and mystery. Who knows?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: People were curious as to what his business was, "as the previous individual was rather well known and the circumstances rather dubious in "disappearance, but I don't know really how that all went together. Anyway! This older collector "was fairly active at this estate until a few months ago. The windows have darkened and stayed "as such. No furniture touched, the interior elements unpacked or moved. Just went away. So I'm "thinking either this fellow has kicked the final bucket, met his end, or is off on some extended "business trip, leaving his acquisition and all of its contents ripe for the picking. Problem is, we "can't get into the Cloudtop District. Kent and Kaylie have tried numerous times. Almost got "arrested." And you can see, Kaylie gives a nod with her shoulders, shrugging. "Still got a few "things to learn, apparently."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you try winking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's the first thing I threw out there, dear." He goes back. "So, seeing as how you folks "have got some pull in the town, I was thinking you could either find a way to get us in quietly, "carefully. Let us do our work, give us some tips on the best way to stay out of sight. Or you could "go in, grab a few things, come back here with the spoils, and we'll take our cut." His eyes look over to you. "I get the feeling that this kind of work is not unfamiliar."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's certainly things we've done in the past.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Didn't we discuss this and assume that this is a house we'd been in once before?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we talking about General Krieg's house, or are we talking about the guy that we first came into his house in Emon, remember? The diplomat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't know either way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know who used to reside there, Doctor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) "The name escapes me."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about a position?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do recall, the Cloudtop District was not at your disposal when you first came here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So this is a new place?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's probably General Krieg's place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Rage-looting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we found the lair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Down in the dungeon, there was the demon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Teleportation device.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It could be a different house.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This was a while ago.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it sound like General Krieg's place? Did you get a description of the place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. Red brick building, iron fence surrounding the outside--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's like every house, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The house, for the most part, the bedroom, everything that you searched, seemed like it was barely touched.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because he was a dragon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, he was a fucking dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was that his house, that he's describing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems pretty damn close to the description that you recall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we were to be interested, it's true that you are pointing us in the direction of this place, but we would be doing all the work. We would need a very high percentage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'd previously discussed a 60-40 split."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know that's what you said. I said high.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 80-20, or I'm not doing shit. You can send him in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey. This is my friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) "A tough bargain, but 80-20 it is."

lines.name: MATT, LIAM
lines.text: (spitting noises)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All righty."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We haven't agreed to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You just did!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We agreed to give you a cut if we go in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fair enough."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's the thing. If you haven't noticed, we have a keep. An embassy. We're known around town. We're council members. We can't go stealing things from people's houses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, that's unfortunate. We'll have to find somebody else."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, hold on. He made a deal with you. If he doesn't do it, we'll find somebody that will. He's a man of his word, and we'll back it up. You don't have to do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, Vex, we have sort of told the sovereign that we are interested keenly in the security of this area, and if this is an unsecured house, we could just be going in to try to secure it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Excellent point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "See? Thinking of the people. That's the Scanlan Shorthalt I know."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And remember, there were dangerous things in that house. We can make sure that it's safe now, protecting the, you know--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. God forbid a child wanders in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: God forbid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're not talking about breaking into a living man's home. Krieg is gone. Krieg was a dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then it was obtained by somebody else, who you don't know who it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, are we talking about General Krieg?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was so dreamy. Do you remember him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was so dreamy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Krieg. I've heard that name. I think that may be the gentleman."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you know Krieg?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I don't know him."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps we should at least take a look to see if there was something else down there that was dangerous.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She said fine! I heard her. She said fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's do this. Tomorrow, we'll set off to do this. In the meantime, we invite you to stay at our keep. Drink of our wine, eat of our food.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, more wine!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Please, make yourselves at home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is this not the greatest bard to have lived?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (chuckles) Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We think so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Scanlan, you humble us all. We're happy to do so. And thank you very much for your fine "hospitality."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You humble us all by comparison.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have one room, in addition to what we stay in. Would all of you be staying in the same one, or would you want to stay in the temple?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have a couple of rooms.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have a dungeon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Our dragonborn room is available now, and as well, we have a dungeon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll stay in the dungeon. They can stay in my room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You invited them to stay because you want to bone Kaylie?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, are you really cock-blocking right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you just say that out loud?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you cock-blocking in the keep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're saying this, Kaylie is watching this with a smirk on her face. "Well, I'm not one "to turn down a soft bed for an evening."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Can't wreck that game! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
