lines.text: Make a perception check. (sings) Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everybody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everybody who wants to look around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 18. Oh mine is-- Oh, 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy. Keyleth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys notice there are bits of dragon bone trapped beneath the rocks. Exposed elements of these bones appear to be scraped and already sundered by somebody harvesting the remains, the long-decayed remains, of Brimscythe. You also notice there are two tunnels to the north and south side of this chamber across from where you guys entered. They're smooth, about ten feet in diameter, and both carve into the heart of the rock.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a nature check?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Umber hulks?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, don't those fuckers do that type of shit? 20 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20? Okay. The way these tunnels are created, and you've seen umber hulks and things of that nature carved through, there is a rough aspect to that digging and burrowing process where the earth itself has an uneven, you know, a general purposed direction, but is in itself a very haphazard just grab and tear what's in your way type form of burrowing. These are round and smooth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No scratch marks, claw marks? Almost seems mechanical type of-- magical?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll assist in that perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you guys can do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And none of us remember them from our past visit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. In fact, one of them is burrowing through the actual rubble on the north side by where the hoard was buried.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) No!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, taking a look. That's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How can you tell?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because it's the flat. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something with bladed or clawed appendages has been here and has very viciously or hurriedly attempted to find its way through the rubble. You also notice there is, to the immediate left and northwestern side of this cavern, a small alcove that just disappears into the wall out of sight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That wasn't there before? Or was that one there before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that was there before, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it seem like this could have been made by a dragon? These scratch marks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You and dragons--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Favored enemy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, as your favored enemy, make a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm scared of all of my d20s right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A nature check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dragons are magical entities. This would be more arcana.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus two on dragon checks. Arcana?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're magical entities. I'll give you either/or. What did you get?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled a 16, but I get plus two on any investigation for dragon info stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. These marks across could very easily have come from a dragon, a very large one. You also notice that there are elements of the rocks amongst this rubble, that there appears to be soot and singe marks across it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are dragons known for digging, or are there certain types of dragons that are known for digging?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're natural burrowers, though not the most intelligent of the chromatic dragons. You also know that some of the metallic dragons also, like the brass dragon is a burrower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would they be capable of making the smooth tunnels?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not that smooth. Those come from something else. You inspecting the alcove?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you look inside the alcove, immediately you see in the shadow and what little bit of light is coming from the outside part of the tunnel, and it is pretty obscured here. I would recommend putting a torch up if you have one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you spark up a torch. You inspect the inside of this alcove and immediately you see the reflection of the light across the surface of something. Something humanoid standing there in wait.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa! And I back up and draw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You draw your weapon and aim it. What you can see, as you take a moment, is an older man, wrinkled in face, eyes open, mouth agape in fear, his arms out before him, back to the wall on the inside. Frozen solid.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I found something! I'm inspecting him as best I can, frozen solid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No! No, I found this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's cold-blooded.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 14. That's a terrible pun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The temperature here is very cold. He may have just frozen to death, but his face, his expression leads you to believe that this was more a moment of duress. More immediate than a slow, subtle, over time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is he wearing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His clothing is very, very well-made. There is embroidery across the sleeves and the base of these robes. He appears to have jewelry on him. He has not quite a Fu Manchu, but a mustache that extends beyond here. The hair is braided and goes to his lower back. He is human, hunched, and that's about the most you can make out at this visual state.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it look like he might be my son? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The resemblance is uncanny. No. On top of being purely human and no one you've ever recognized, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I suspect everyone now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if he's the owner of the house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The northern tunnel, the smooth tunnel as you bring your torch over, whoever's inspecting the north one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure, why not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have to, but as you guys look up, having low-light vision helps in this circumstance, as well. You can see a little bit of a glistening. As you peer into the smooth tunnel ahead of you, you can see that where the rock was burrowed through, a portion of it has opened up a pocket, and there's a small fountain of gold spilling into the tunnel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A fountain of gold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not like a perpetual-- it looks like whatever tore through here, gold pieces that were buried as part of the collapsing tunnel were exposed and spilled into the tunnel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bag of Holding!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, I have it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a Scrooge Dragon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I go over and put it under the gold. I open up the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. Why are we here? Why have we come here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, and remember last time we did this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we just getting as much money as we can and leave, or are we trying to kill something, or are we trying to seal this place off? Why are we here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't believe I'm saying this, but I'm with Scanlan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's gold!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should definitely take that frozen man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So is our mission to take money and leave?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. There's a frozen man. We actually have a mystery. We have to deal with this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, Ashley. I can't hear her. What did she say?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The frozen man is obviously dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The frozen man is very dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he is? He's dead dead?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's dead dead. He might be the owner of the house.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did I freeze?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pike, you're frozen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we can still hear you, so keep talking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because they said he was an older art collector, gray-haired man, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What elements of the individual that you've heard about does match some of the description of this individual.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm sorry. I would like to see if I could cast Speak With Dead and ask some questions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We might have to unfreeze him first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can maybe do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Torch-heating the face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll light up my fire hands and start melting, just his face.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Melting around his mouth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The spell does require the corpse to be able to speak, so you would have to thaw him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thawing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's going to take you a little bit, but using your simple druidic powers. You're using cantrips, essentially. Or your fire hands. Yeah, so it'll take you a little while, but you begin to thaw the corpse. What's everyone else doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're trying to get the gold out from the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm trying to get the gold out from the wall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you're going, I'm going with you to protect you because god knows Trinket won't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm keeping an eye on the south.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can Move Earth and we can move around earth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perception check the whole way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys step along. You go with Vex into the tunnel. You're watching the south area as they pass you, and you're currently thawing. Is Trinket coming with you guys, or is Trinket staying with you in the tunnel?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's going to be with us in the tunnel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool. And you're with?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm with Vex and Trink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like someone has already pulled in here, and there's an empty pocket there, but you start pulling gold out and scooping it into the Bag of Holding. As you guys are walking away, you feel this lurch in the floor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I stop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, that's not us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we feel it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can everyone feel it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All you guys begin to feel this vibration in the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, maybe we should stop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Faster, faster!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just pause for a second!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It gets louder and more violent. You see the coins on the ground beginning to rattle and move.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perception roll to tell if it's an earthquake?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think because we touched this gold--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nature check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It feels like an earthquake.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shouting) Earthquake! Get to the archways! (quieter) Find a bathroom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the shouting has happened, towards the center of the room, the ground explodes. There is a blast of shrapnel shale that bursts in the vicinity. No one is immediately there, so none of you are harshly impacted, but you see erupting from the ground a large form begin to burst out of the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hide.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike! Ask the dead guy who it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because Pike and I are by the dead guy, right? I take Pike and back her behind the dead guy, and we're hiding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys see this form now in the low light emerge. Ten, 15, 20, 25 feet up, this long, cylindrical mass curves up and begins to shift. As it does, like a giant arm, it twists around and stares at the room, and what you see before you is this elongated wormlike structure where a giant mouth opens up with rows and rows of sharp teeth on the interior of its toothy maw. Deal with it! It's the perfect circumstance for the term. As you see strands of saliva pull apart and you see a very hint of color beneath the dark surface, a deep purple tone to its thick segmented hide.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've fought one of these before, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you have not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have not? I hide. I hide in my cloak.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So next week, we're going to pick up with that chaos.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ash, you have to be here next week, too!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What the fuck is a purple worm?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Put that thing away. Put it back in the bag.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't think I'm working next Thursday.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Fly home!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll all pitch in. I'm kind of serious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, chat room, buy her a ticket home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't! Don't do it. They're too nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't do that. We'll pick up at the start of this encounter next Thursday. Things with tremorsense are fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much gold did we get, though, before it cocked up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll find out. You haven't had a chance to count.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll finish looting that once we've cut this thing up into little pieces of sushi.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, Matt knows us really well. We walk into every fucking everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, sometimes you just have to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't walk away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what adventure is!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've got to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a series of bad decisions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You really don't have to, but it was an option.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Danger lurks behind you.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: What to do, just grab onto some--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (singing) Critical Role!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (singing) Whoo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [end of transcript]
